title: Smoked trout
ingredients: ['1kg (2 1/4 lb) trout fillets', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 1/2 tablespoons dried rosemary, crushed', '300g (11 oz) curing salt', '1 litre (1 2/3 pints) water', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '500g (1 1/4 lb) wood chips, soaked in water or wine and squeezed dry']
